hero.title: The innovation and transformation ecosystem
hero.description: A platform made by and for students of the Federal University of ABC, promoting mentorships, academic content, and community support throughout undergraduate studies.

about.title: About UFABC Next
about.description: UFABC Next was born from the need to create a support and academic development community within the Federal University of ABC, where students could share knowledge, experiences, and better prepare for undergraduate challenges.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: Facilitate the academic journey of UFABC students through a support network, knowledge sharing, and development tools.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To be recognized as the main academic development support initiative at UFABC, becoming a reference for other universities.

impact.title: Our Impact
impact.content: Over 2,000 students impacted, hundreds of mentorships conducted, and an active community that transforms academic experiences.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: UFABC Next operates on multiple fronts to ensure a more complete and enriching university experience.
